QuestData.Title: Grassroots Effort
QuestData.Description:
When I arrived at my home, the front door was barred by magical roots.
I was able to remove them, but few of my tribe possess the necessary ability to do so themselves.
Take my staff. Its powers will easily disentangle the obstructing roots.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Old Grizzelback's Staff to destroy $1oa snarled brambles in Grizzleweald.
